content.metaTitle: Panduan Dasar Sarana Produksi Pertanian - Konsep & Alur
content.metaDesc: Panduan lengkap memahami sarana produksi pertanian: definisi, komponen utama, alur dasar, dan kesalahan umum yang perlu dihindari. Edukatif & netral.

images.prompt:
A RAW, UNEDITED PHOTOGRAPH taken by a human using a real digital camera. Scene description: sarana, produksi, pertanian, ###, definisi. Theme: Indonesian agriculture, farming, agricultural products. 

Camera & capture conditions:
- Shot on a real DSLR or mirrorless camera
- Natural daylight only
- No artificial lighting
- No cinematic lighting
- No dramatic lighting
- Slightly uneven exposure
- Natural shadows
- Realistic color balance (not vibrant, not stylized)
- Slight grain / noise typical of camera sensors
- Imperfect framing (not symmetrical, not centered)

Human realism constraints:
- Looks like an ordinary photo taken by a farmer or traveler
- Not a stock photo
- Not a promotional photo
- Not staged
- Not studio quality
- Not cinematic
- Not illustration
- Not painting
- Not vector
- Not 3D render
- Not AI art

Output requirements:
- Looks like a casual photo upload from a real human camera
- No artistic enhancement
- No filters
- No HDR
- No text, no watermark
